price: Su morada será el Infierno del que no encontrarán escapatoria.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
